level.heading: A market business in the fulton fish market distribution area as such term is defined in section 22-251 of this code shall be subject to the provisions governing market businesses in chapter 1-B of this title.
level.text: ยง 22-202.1 A market business in the fulton fish market distribution area as such term is defined in section 22-251 of this code shall be subject to the provisions governing market businesses in chapter 1-B of this title.
